name: One player Online - Jam Version
description:
It's a battle royale... but all the other players are missing! Each round you have to track down the target orbs and destroy them before your time is up! However even though the game servers are empty the game really wants you to stay and spawns a ghost of your previous life each round. You must also hunt them down before the round ends. 

Do Battle!

Explore!

Unlock hats along the way!

Move with WASD, jump with spacebar, shoot with left click!

Credits:

-All the good 3d models
-All the good 3d Texturing

-2D art
-Bad 3d models(and terrain)
-Rigging and Animation
-SFX

Kevin Macleod
-Music(Tracks used are Kick Shock, Phat Sketch, Funk Game Loop, Voxel revolution, and Neon laser Horizon)
